pages.text: The Item Frame is an entity that can be used to displays the item or block that is inside it.$(br2)They can be dyed placing an Item Frame and the specific Dye in a Crafting Table.$(br2)They can be placed in the walls or on the ground.
You can make $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/glass_item_frame)Glass Item Frames$(/l) with the Item Frames.$(br2)Insert a picture of Item frames dyed in the walls and on the ground

The Glass Item Frame is a variation of the $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/item_frame)Item Frames$(/l).$(br)$(li)When a map is placed in a Glass Item Frame, it will update in real time$(br)$(li)If you put a Banner inside a Glass Item Frame, it will sit flat with the wall with the pattern that's in it

$(li)Shields will sit flush with the wall$(br)$(li)Glass Item Frames can be right clicked to open Chests$(br)$(li)When a map is placed in a Glass Item Frame, it will update in real time$(br)$(li)Glass Item Frames can attach to the front of a Sign that's placed on the floor. This will make the item show flush with the Sign

$(li)Combining a Glass Item Frame with a Glowstone Dust creates a Glowing Glass.$(br)This one makes the placed item bright in the darkness$(br2)Insert a picture of Item frames dyed in the walls and on the ground
